nodes.text: This Imperial ore facility was Located on Gap Nine. It was managed by Colonel Icus Traft. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, a group of Rebel operatives went on a sabotage mission to destroy the facility. The mission was first foiled, but the Rebels managed to escape. However, the explosives planted by the Rebels were never discovered by Taft's men, and the Rebels eventually returned and completed their mission, destroying the ore facility.
